topic: Benchmarks and Datasets for AI Agents in Interactive Environments

  entities:
    Alfred|Benchmark
    AlfWorld|Dataset
    SmartPlay|Benchmark
    Mind2Web|Project
    VisualWebArena|Benchmark
    VideoWebErena|Benchmark

    Meta-GUI|Project
    AndroidWorld|Benchmark
    OSWorld|Benchmark
    Windows Agent Arena|Benchmark
    OmniACT|Dataset
    GUI-WORLD|Dataset

  proposition: Alfred is a benchmark for interpreting grounded instructions for everyday tasks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Alfred|DESCRIBED_BY|benchmark for interpreting grounded instructions for everyday tasks

    entity-entity relationships:
    (none)

  proposition: Alfred was presented at the IEEE/CVF conference on computer vision and pattern recognition in 2020.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Alfred|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2020
    Alfred|PRESENTED_AT|IEEE/CVF conference on computer vision and pattern recognition

    entity-entity relationships:
    (none)

  proposition: AlfWorld aligns text and embodied environments for interactive learning.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AlfWorld|DESCRIBED_BY|aligns text and embodied environments for interactive learning

    entity-entity relationships:
    (none)

  proposition: AlfWorld was published as an arXiv preprint in 2020.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AlfWorld|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2020
    AlfWorld|PUBLICATION_PLATFORM|arXiv

    entity-entity relationships:
    (none)

  proposition: SmartPlay is a benchmark for evaluating large language models as intelligent agents.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SmartPlay|DESCRIBED_BY|benchmark for evaluating large language models as intelligent agents

    entity-entity relationships:
    (none)

  proposition: SmartPlay was published as an arXiv preprint in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SmartPlay|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2023
    SmartPlay|PUBLICATION_PLATFORM|arXiv

    entity-entity relationships:
    (none)

  proposition: Mind2Web aims to develop a generalist agent for the web.

    (none)

    (none)

  proposition: VideoWebErena evaluates long context multimodal agents with video understanding web tasks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    VideoWebErena|DESCRIBED_BY|evaluates long context multimodal agents with video understanding web tasks

    entity-entity relationships:

    (none)

    (none)

  proposition: OmniACT is a dataset and benchmark for multimodal generalist autonomous agents for desktop and web.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    OmniACT|DESCRIBED_BY|dataset and benchmark for multimodal generalist autonomous agents for desktop and web

    entity-entity relationships:
    (none)

  proposition: OmniACT was presented at the European Conference on Computer Vision in 2025.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    OmniACT|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2025
    OmniACT|PRESENTED_AT|European Conference on Computer Vision

    entity-entity relationships:
    (none)

    (none)
